articles.author: The Race Team
articles.title: Six driver market repercussions of Alonso's 2025 F1 choice - The Race
articles.description: Fernando Alonso's taken himself out of Mercedes and Red Bull contention by committing to a longer Aston Martin stay, closed a door for some rivals and done others a favour
articles.content: Fernando Alonso was Mercedes plan B for 2025, but he was always Aston Martins plan A - and now hes decided to repay that faith by halting his own push for a Red Bull seat and sticking with Aston Mart… [+10174 chars]
